name: MagiCafe HD
description:
Follow fledgling magical girl Darcy Dragonfruit as she simply tries to get to work!

Originally, MagiCafe was a text-only game made in 2020 using Twine as a project for college, now on its two year anniversary the game is back as a visual novel! Enjoy the story of Darcy Dragonfruit and her trip to get to work - now with cute lineless sprites, background music, and revised writing in the Ren'py engine.

  • Quick to beat visual novel - Under an hour to play completely!
  • Play multiple times to get the 6 different endings!
  • A colorful cast based on various fruits!
  • Perhaps...romance?
  • Also A Literal Clown*

*Note: She's actually a jester.
